name: Add Product To Cart Via URL
author: Better Developer Docs

sections.description: Allows a CMS users (eg shop admin) to create a URL (for WooCommerce only) with specific product(s) and quantity info. When clicked by a user this URL will load those products into the users cart and take them to the checkout page automatically. Works for simple, grouped and variable products.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Full description of how to use Add Product To Cart Via URL Plugin.

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Plugin released.

2.0

  • Added ability to create URLs for grouped and variable products.

When clicked by a user this URL will load those products into the users cart and take them to the checkout page automatically. Works for simple, grouped and variable products.

screenshots.caption: View of the 'Add to Cart URL creator' Form which you use to create a URL to send to users.
